title: Mcheil怎么设置坦克不破坏地形？

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
阿狸哥哥 发表于 2020-4-22 17:45
我是这样，但是还是被破坏了[/url][/img]
Collision_DestroyBlock也设为false

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
参考
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... 84&pid=10904131
在.Minecraft里的config里面找到mcheli

点进去修改
Explosion_DestroyBlock = true
Explosion_FlamingBlock = true

把这两项修改成
Explosion_DestroyBlock = false
Explosion_FlamingBlock = false
